alert.note: Alert for Allen; Evangeline; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:17AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rapides, northern Jefferson Davis, northwestern Evangeline, eastern Beauregard, eastern Vernon and Allen Parishes through 700 AM CDT... At 617 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clifton to near Ragley. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, De Ridder, Oakdale, Kinder, Oberlin, Rosepine, Glenmora, Elton, Boyce, Elizabeth, Fenton, Reeves, Sugartown, Hineston, Lena, Mittie, Dry Creek, Fort Polk and Alexandria International Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 58 and 61. Interstate 49 between mile markers 72 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
